children.description: Notification body, place main text here
children.description_zh: 通知正文，将正文放在这里

closeButtonProps.description: Props passed down to the close button
closeButtonProps.description_zh: 传递到 close 按钮的 props

color.description: Controls notification line or icon color, key of theme.colors or any valid CSS color, theme.primaryColor by default
color.description_zh: 默认控制通知行或图标颜色、theme.colors 的键或任何有效的 CSS 颜色 theme.primaryColor

icon.description_zh: 通知图标，替换彩色线条

loading.description: Replaces colored line or icon with Loader component
loading.description_zh: 将彩色线条或图标替换为 Loader 组件

onClose.description: Called when close button is clicked

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius, theme.defaultRadius by default
radius.description_zh: theme.radius 的键或任何用于设置 border-radius 的任何有效 CSS 值，默认为 theme.defaultRadius

title.description_zh: 通知标题，显示在正文之前

withBorder.description: Determines whether notification should have a border, false by default
withBorder.description_zh: 确定通知是否应具有边框，默认情况下为 false

withCloseButton.description: Determines whether close button should be visible, true by default
withCloseButton.description_zh: 确定关闭按钮是否可见，默认为 true
